version_description:
Thanks for using Mideo! What's new:

-Edit videos right away

-View remaining storage

-GREATLY reduced the amount of space Mideo takes up, saving you hours of video

-Save even faster

-Go to camera roll straight from Mideo

-Improved user experience

-and more!

-and more!

Thanks for using Mideo!
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Mainly resolved a situation where users who had not previously granted authorization were not able to save the first video they ever took using the app.

This version fixes a bug that paused SoundCloud music.

This version fixes a bug that paused SoundCloud music.

Thanks for using Mideo! This update brings to you a much better UI, a default flash setting, a support page, landscape mode, the ability to overlay grid lines, and several bug fixes and feature improvements. Plus, you can now open straight into the video camera without having to click several buttons.
As always, these fixes are thanks to the users who send suggestions and bug reports. Email me at iam@willsaid.com if you want me to add a feature!

Thanks for using Mideo! This update brings to you a much better UI, a default flash setting, a support page, landscape mode, the ability to overlay grid lines, and several bug fixes and feature improvements. Plus, you can now open straight into the video camera without having to click several buttons.
As always, these fixes are thanks to the users who send suggestions and bug reports. Email me at iam@willsaid.com if you want me to add a feature!

Thanks for supporting an independent app developer currently attending college for computer science!

This update includes the usual bug fixes and performance improvements, plus
- The Silent video issue is now resolved
- To delete a video, you now need to double tap "Retake," due to several users losing their videos by accidentally tapping the wrong button.
- A fix for a user who wasn't able to save their videos to their device

Thanks for supporting an independent app developer currently attending college for computer science!

This update includes the usual bug fixes and performance improvements, plus
- The Silent video issue is now resolved
- To delete a video, you now need to double tap "Retake," due to several users losing their videos by accidentally tapping the wrong button.
- A fix for a user who wasn't able to save their videos to their device

Thanks for supporting an independent app developer currently attending college for computer science!

This update includes the usual bug fixes and performance improvements, plus
-Added confirmation for deleting/retaking videos (thanks to the user who texted me this suggestion!)
-Fixed errors related to saving for some rare instances
-Added the ability to set your own external mic (thanks to the drummer who emailed me this suggestion!)
-Fixed issue where users with very low remaining storage were failing to save videos

Thanks for the support, and continue to email/text me (from the FAQ page) any suggestions!

This update includes the usual bug fixes and performance improvements, plus
-Added confirmation for deleting/retaking videos (thanks to the user who texted me this suggestion!)
-Fixed errors related to saving for some rare instances
-Added the ability to set your own external mic (thanks to the drummer who emailed me this suggestion!)

Thanks for the support, and continue to email/text me (from the FAQ page) any suggestions!

Thanks to all of your feedback and suggestions (keep sending them to me at iam@willsaid.com):
-Fixed an issue where users had an infinite loading indicator even though the video already saved
-Fixed the "No Video Data" issue
-Fixed the "No Internet Connection" issue

Thanks for using Mideo! 

This update includes a Welcome screen with instructions on how to use the app, plus the usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

Contact us in the app for any support.

Thanks for using Mideo! 

This update includes a Welcome screen with instructions on how to use the app, plus the usual bug fixes and performance improvements.

Contact us in the app for any support.

Thanks for using Mideo! What's new:

- Share Extension sheet
- Save video on background thread
- Add option to start recording automatically
- Don't automatically present image picker if Record Automatically is off
- View welcome instructions from the home screen
- UI layout improvements for other languages

Contact us in the app for any support!
